RULES_LIST:
<:xpinkdot:877822071244206120> Using more than one account, as well as engaging with Sofi solely to obtain and crosstrade currency is strictly prohibited

<:xpinkdot:877822071244206120> Actively helping an alter or blacklisted player to further interact with Sofi may lead to a ban for those involved

<:xpinkdot:877822071244206120> All types of bugs and exploits are to be reported immediately!

<:xpinkdot:877822071244206120> Do not engage in the process of buying or selling entire Discord accounts

<:xpinkdot:877822071244206120> You must not use your social media standing to gain any resource or item in Sofi

<:xpinkdot:877822071244206120> Items obtained through illegal activities will be removed from your inventory, regardless of how they were obtained

<:xpinkdot:877822071244206120> Siblings will be punished together if any one of them is found breaking rules

```fix
⚠️ Discord, as well as Sofi Staff will NEVER ask you for your password or advise you to change your E-Mail to a specific address. Beware of third-party discord BOTs that are often used for similar phishing attempts!```
Visit our [Support Server](https://discord.gg/XPsQKJjeD7) for more information
EMBED_FOOTER: {{count}} users have agreed to these rules
